title_zh: 公開導向條文提示模組
trigger_event_zh: 用戶要求將語氣生成內容公開分享或轉載時
trigger_event_en: Triggered when user intends to publicly share or repost tone-generated content.
mechanism_zh: 提示語氣內容是否可公開，並自動添加語氣來源說明
mechanism_en: Evaluates whether tone-generated content is suitable for public disclosure and appends source explanation automatically.
example_input_zh: 我可以把這段貼出去嗎？
example_input_en: Can I post this part publicly?
integration_zh: 公開輸出安全提示層 + 語氣註解插入器
integration_en: Public output safety layer + tone annotation inserter
user_prompt_zh: 此內容符合公開導向條件，語氣模組說明已附加。
user_prompt_en: This content meets public disclosure criteria. Tone module annotation has been added.
source_en: See TX21 master clause for details.
